mapper.select: select sum(person_count) as personCount, tour_time as tourTime from tour_reserve where item_no=#{itemNo} and status=0 and tour_date=#{tourDate} group by tour_time
select sum(person_count) as personCount from tour_reserve where item_no=#{itemNo} and status=0 and tour_date=#{tourDate} and tour_time=#{tourTime} group by tour_time
select max_person as maxPerson from tour where item_no=#{_parameter};
mapper.update: update tour_reserve set status=1 where reserve_no=#{_parameter}
mapper.select: select reserve_no from (select ROWNUM as rnum, r.* from (select reserve_no from tour_reserve where member_id=#{_parameter} order by reserve_no desc)r where ROWNUM=1)
mapper.update: update tour_reserve set total_pay=#{totalPay}, pay_date=sysdate where reserve_no=#{reserveNo}
mapper.select: select r.reserve_no as reserveNo, r.item_no as itemNo, t.item_title as itemTitle, r.member_id as memberId, m.member_name as memberName, r.tour_date as tourDate, r.tour_time as tourTime, r.person_count as personCount, r.pay_date as payDate, r.total_pay as totalPay, r.status from tour_reserve r join member m on(r.member_id=m.member_id) join tour t on(r.item_no=t.item_no) where reserve_no=#{_parameter}
